title: Honestly, does anyone not consider Ekko cancer?
body: Inbetween his constant dashing, his fail-safe ult and ridiculous damage - what's the actual downside to this champion since he's practically ungankable, great wave clear and roam potential? People complain {{champion:157}} is cancer, but I'd rather face Yas than Ekko any day.

replies.body: are you actually looking for answers on how to play vs ekko, or just shitposting because you got wrecked by one ingame?
prob the second one, with how the boards normally work.
sorry bud it's a popular opinion ekko is cancer.
Ever since his tank builds died his popularity dropped. He may still be complete cancer, but to quote the Yasuo haters he isn't in "every single game, whether banned or picked"
Why do people just make shitpost salt threads instead of asking for any actual help?

A pretty huge portion of ekko's damage is wrapped in skillshots, and if he can't land his stun (which is another skillshot, probably one of the harder to land abilities I've seen) or get fed, he's basically relegated to doing chip damage with his q.

even a useless feeding yasuo can ruin a teamfight with his windwall, and using it properly is not NEARLY as difficult as timing and aiming ekko's stun. Additionally, yasuo does way more RELIABLE damage.
Ekko isn't terribly bad as an AP midlaner, but they had to hurt him a lot to make sure tank Ekko would never return.
because {{champion:157}} is a very good champion to have in team fights and is very good 1v1. {{champion:245}} is easy to play so no one complains about him.

Cause he's not fotm

Even viktor or velkoz will be considered cancer if they're tier 1 lmfao
I play morgana mid, I just wait for him to use his wave clear then go in.
Honestly, does anyone not get sick of your QQing?
